description:
hi
i use the command nova live-migration instance in version newton.the instance migrated to new compute successed.but sometimes，the vm status was shutoff。check the log，no error，no crash，nothing special。
thanks
title: live-migration sometimes failed

comments.content: i use the command nova live-migration instance.the instance migrated to new compute successed.but sometimes，the vm status was shutoff。check the log，no error，no crash，nothing special。
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hyznull

comments.content:
When you mean the instance is shutoff, what's the exact state of the instance ? Is it ACTIVE with a power state of SHUTDOWN or PAUSED ?

There are cases in the compute manager where we verify the compare the state between the hypervisor and the DB, and if we can't find the instance on the hypervisor side, then we stop the instance.

In general, that means you hitted some problem when migrating that instance and traces can be found in logs.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza

comments.content:
hi ,Sylvain Bauza:
   as u said ,after migration ,my instance ACTIVE with a power state of SHUTDOWN ,wait for a moment,STATS turn to SHUTDOWN.
   what should i do whith this?
   thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hyznull

comments.content:
hi ,Sylvain Bauza：
    i found this WARNING in my log.
2017-06-27 19:52:21.461 5710 WARNING nova.compute.manager [-] [instance: ccc70205-f743-4667-83f6-eacbed978cfa] Instance shutdown by itself. Calling the stop API. Current vm_state: active, current task_state: None, original DB power_state: 4, current VM power_state: 4
2017-06-27 19:52:21.462 5710 DEBUG nova.compute.api [-] [instance: ccc70205-f743-4667-83f6-eacbed978cfa] Going to try to stop instance force_stop /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/api.py:2086
     thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hyznull

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
